TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebException extends System.InvalidOperationException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type WebException = class inherit InvalidOperationException interface ISerializable

summary.span: 通过可插接协议访问网络期间出错时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs while accessing the network through a pluggable protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由从 和实现可插入协议以便访问 Internet 的类引发。 The class is thrown by classes descended from and that implement pluggable protocols for accessing the Internet. 当由类的子代引发时, 属性提供对应用程序的 Internet 响应。When is thrown by a descendant of the class, the property provides the Internet response to the application. **相关提示****Associated Tips** **检查异常的 Response 属性以确定请求失败的原因。****Check the Response property of the exception to determine why the request failed.** 如果 异常是由 类的派生类引发的，则 属性向应用程序提供 Internet 响应。When a exception is thrown by a descendent of the class, the property provides the Internet response to the application. **检查异常的 Status 属性以确定请求失败的原因。****Check the Status property of the exception to determine why the request failed.** 异常的 属性提供错误的状态信息。The property of the exception provides status information for the error. 有关更多信息，请参见。For more information, see . **如果单步执行 XML Web Services 时超时, 请将 XML Web Services 调用的超时值设置为无限。****If you are timing out when stepping into an XML Web Service, set the timeout value for the XML Web Service call to infinite.** 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Error: Timeout While Debugging Web Services](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b7df112-788a-4429-9a0c-4c6dac4fb609)。For more information, see [Error: Timeout While Debugging Web Services](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b7df112-788a-4429-9a0c-4c6dac4fb609).

summary.span: 获取远程主机返回的响应。

span.span: Gets the response that the remote host returned.

value.span: 如果可从 Internet 资源获得响应，则为包含来自 Internet 资源的错误响应的 实例；否则为 。

span.span: If a response is available from the Internet resource, a instance that contains the error response from an Internet resource; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 Internet 协议 (如 HTTP) 将返回指示在协议级别发生错误的有效响应。Some Internet protocols, such as HTTP, return otherwise valid responses indicating that an error has occurred at the protocol level. 当对 Internet 请求的响应指示错误时, 将属性设置为 , 并在的属性中提供包含错误消息的。出.When the response to an Internet request indicates an error, sets the property to and provides the that contains the error message in the property of the that was thrown. 应用程序可以检查以确定实际错误。The application can examine the to determine the actual error. ## Examples 下面的示例检查属性, 并将基础实例的和输出到控制台。The following example checks the property and prints to the console the and of the underlying instance. [!code-cpp[WebException_Status_Response#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebException_Status_Response/CPP/webexception_status_response.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebException_Status_Response#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebException_Status_Response/CS/webexception_status_response.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebException_Status_Response#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebException_Status_Response/VB/webexception_status_response.vb#1)]
